casebody.data:
SEALMASTER, L.L.C., Plaintiff-Appellant, v. SILVERLINE BUILDING PRODUCTS and Home Depot USA, Inc., Defendants-Appellees. No. 01-1551. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. April 5, 2002. Rehearing Denied May 2, 2002.

*588Before MAYER, Chief Judge, NEWMAN, and PROST, Circuit Judge.

Judgment

PER CURIAM.

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is ORDERED and ADJUDGED:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
